title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Longniddry Bents, Scotland
content:
Photo submitted by Dug Wales, “This is the ‘frozen’ North Sea from Longniddry Bents, Scotland which are part of the John Muir Way coastal walk. Looking across the Firth of Forth bay to Edinburgh’s skyline. Taken January 24th, 2021.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them […]

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Longniddry Bents, Scotland appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
